nodes.text: Night Herald was a Killik title, bestowed upon Killiks and Joiners alike. It was given to Welk when he became a Joiner of the Gorog nest, becoming the guardian of the nest's Unseen Queen, Lomi Plo. Upon Welk's death at the hands of Luke Skywalker, Alema Rar, herself having become recently Joined, took up the mantle of Night Herald until her defeat at the hands of Leia Organa Solo and the destruction of the Dark Nest.
